summary: Questions about the identity of an amnesiac (Matthew Montgomery) threaten his romance with the park ranger (Aaron Orr) who rescued him.
cast: Matthew Montgomery|Aaron Orr|Ariadne Shaffer|Joel Bryant|Brenda Lasker|Bryna Weiss|Holden Roark|Jenny Kim|Daniel Lee|Mark Fellows|Joanne Bevelaqua|Glenn Blakeslee|Sandon Berg|Brooke Hamlin|Bel Parker
title: Desaparece pero no se olvida
